name: tractor production, 4-wheel, agricultural | tractor, 4-wheel, agricultural | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3016/documentation

This dataset represents the production of tractors. Representatives of this class are for example: tractor, transporter or two-axle mower. Calculations were made based on a tractor of 3000 kg, with a useful life of 7000 hours and a repair factor of 0.74. For exact results, module should only be used if lifetime and repair factor of the balanced machinery are within a narrow range of the values the module is based on. The functional unit is 1kg tractor during its lifetime.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From reception of the materials and energy resources at the factory gate.

This activity ends with the disposal of the agricultural machinery.The dataset includes the use of resources and the amount of emissions during the production, the maintenance and repair and the disposal of the tractor. The dataset doesn't include the impacts caused by fuel consumption during operation-time of the machinery, and the amount of emission from the tyre abrasion during this time. No data was available about buildings needed for manufacture and maintenance of the machinery.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./282:Manufacture of special-purpose machinery/2821:Manufacture of agricultural and forestry machinery
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Agriculture & Animal Husbandry

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Considered references range from start- to end-date
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The inventories apply to the production in Western Europe and transportation to Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Approximate figures for this representative type of agricultural machinery in operation in 1996 (for some representatives, in 1990) in Switzerland. Values are based and adapted on a different technology (lorries-manufacture).
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data are extrapolated, examined and adapted from lorry production in Europe.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Values given in the reference originate mainly from studies about lorry production in Europe as examined and adapted by Zimmermann (2002) and experts estimations.
